document.discussion_title: Home of the Day: An Entertainer's Dream Home with Expansive Deck & Surprise Views
document.topic_text: By Meg Burkett, Broker Home of the Day is presented by the Puget Sound Business Journal with Realogics Sotheby's International Realty. This is your invitation to view some of Seattle's most-luxurious properties. Come inside and take a look around. Click on the gallery image to view today's featured property. 9034 Daniel Place NW, Silverdale, WA 98383 | $438,000 Exciting new listing in desirable Silverdale with award winning CK schools! Surprise water views and 860sf, 1 bed, 1 bath daylight basement… ...
